item.title: Demos: Tame the Phoenix! Minimizing UI5 apps footprint to run from an ESP8266
item.content:encoded: A while back, I sent this twitter message into the Twitter-verse, with the intention to blog shortly after that on how I got UI5 running on an ESP8266. I’m afraid this blog was conceived a bit...

item.title: Demos: OpenUI5 Custom Controls for charting
item.content:encoded: This sample OpenUI5 web app demonstrated custom UI controls that act as wrapper for charting libraries. It shows you how to integrate simple charts into OpenUI5 apps.

item.title: Demos: Instantly Prototype Responsive MVC-based Web Apps
item.content:encoded: At NCDEVCON - North Carolinas Premier Web Mobile Conference - Alex shows how to build instant prototypes with UI5 in this recording. Watch how to build UI5 apps with just very few steps.

item.title: Demos: SAPUI5 single file template using XMLViews, Controllers, Fragments and Custom Controls for bug illustrations, support requests or demos
item.content:encoded: As the UI5 community is growing every day I have experienced that people new to UI5 find it hard to create simple demos demonstrating their issues. I have seem many questions onStackoverflow and...

item.title: Demos: Hybrid apps for Windows Phone
item.content:encoded: As we had several inquiries about how to build up a OpenUI5 application in a Windows Phone hybrid app recently, we have investigated a bit in that area. You may have heard that there is a problem...

item.title: Demos: Lessons Learned From Working With Fakes and Mocks in UI5
item.content:encoded: I have recently worked on a UI5 project where we built an event-driven service-based architecture. We followed the TDD principles for most parts, so naturally, we ended up having lots of fake and mock...

item.title: Demos: Why initializing properties on prototypes can have nasty side effects in SAPUI5
item.content:encoded: Recently a colleague reviewed some of my SAPUI5 tutorials. He pointed out that declaring and initializing private properties directly on the prototype object can lead to issues. This could especially...

item.title: Demos: Rounded Tiles in UI5
item.content:encoded: Ive been working with OpenUI5 for a few months now and I grew tired of the sharp tiles provided by the standard library. Good thing OpenUI5 allows the inheritance between components so that we can...

item.title: Demos: Creating modularized SAPUI5 applications with XML Views, Routing and i18n
item.content:encoded: In this tutorial you will learn how to create modularized SAPUI5 applications using XML Views and Routing. We will create a simple Shell application that loads its content from XML Views, uses Routing...

item.title: Demos: Analysing UK Road Traffic Accident data with HANA and SAPUI5
item.content:encoded: This blog demonstrates how to load, transform and analyse UK road traffic accident data on mobile devices with HANA, SAPUI5 and Google Maps.  The end results look like this on an iPhone, analysing...
